ResearchProjectDef.label: charge turrets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize charge weaponry and vanometric cells to produce small, powerful turrets with no external power or maintenance requirements.

ResearchProjectDef.label: exoskeleton belt
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to assemble exoskeleton belts, which can be worn to improve various abilities depending on the type.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ranged shield belt
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop advanced algorithms which allow the construction of personal shields which can differentiate betwee incoming and outgoing fire..

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic robotics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Design robotic chassis capable of simple navigation tasks, such as cleaning.

ResearchProjectDef.label: orbital mechanics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop advanced launchers capable of putting pods in orbit, and develop advanced physical theories capable of placing communication and orbital bombardment satellites in position.

ResearchProjectDef.label: asteroid mining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Optimize pod designs to allow launches beyond the planet's orbit, into interplanetary space, and develop guidance systems so basic personas can navigate to and mine asteroids.

ResearchProjectDef.label: orbital power transfer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop optimized solar panel designs and refine energy weapon schematics in order to efficiently transfer energy from geostationary satellites - or call down their power upon your enemies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: materials science
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover advanced matter-manipulation techniques allowing the construction of a Matterweaver and basic matter-woven materials, such as Synthread.

ResearchProjectDef.label: full-immersion displays
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop techniques for hyperresolution screens which cause the user to feel immersed in depicted scenes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: healing foam
ResearchProjectDef.description: Adapt expanding foam technology and basic material science to rapidly seal and disinfect wounds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: insulene
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover advanced material fabrication techniques allowing you to produce Insulene, a weak but incredibly insulative fabric.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hyperweave
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research the creation of Hyperweave, a highly durable fabric, by matterweaving devilstrand and plasteel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: wood synthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to use matterweaving techniques to sculpt wood from raw cellulose.

ResearchProjectDef.label: fleshprinting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to construct the Flesh Printer, a device capable of printing meat from biomass, and some basic use cases like meat and leather production.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced bioproduction
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop advanced techniques to manipulate biological structures by suspending particles in liquids, allowing the production of milk and the automation of meat growth.

ResearchProjectDef.label: organ assembly
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the secrets of manipulating animal tissue, allowing the printing of organs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nanofabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use a purchased Nano Forge to construct the Nanofabricator, a bench which produces and programs nanites.

ResearchProjectDef.label: vanometric battery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use nanite-based power regulators to make use of the energy from purchased vanometric cells in a compact package.

ResearchProjectDef.label: aerocrete
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop techniques to nanofabricate microorganisms and disperse them within liquid composite building materials, allowing the creation of a material which can repair itself over time.

ResearchProjectDef.label: on-demand nanofabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Optimize nanite production regimes and develop a basic nanite field theory to construct devices which can rapidly assemble or repair things.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nano rifle
ResearchProjectDef.description: Miniaturize nanite programmers into a usable package capable of melting its targets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nanite biorepair
ResearchProjectDef.description: Modify nanite repair projectors to operate on living tissue.

ResearchProjectDef.label: glitterworld medicine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Combine medicine, synthread, and nanomaterial to produce highly potent medicine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nanite biomanipulation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop nanite treatment systems which can be dispersed in the blood to fight infections or addiction.

ResearchProjectDef.label: luciferium production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Leverage advanced knowledge of nanites to program Luciferium, albeit at a high cost...

ResearchProjectDef.label: intensive nanite healing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Optimize nanite biorepair mechanisms to allow their safe use in high concentrations and at long range.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bioaugmentation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize regeneration pods to stabilize individuals undergoing CRIPSR treatment, allowing agressive modifications to their genome.

ResearchProjectDef.label: neural network basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn basic inorganic psychology and intelligence design and use it to manipulate basic persona constructs for purposes such as biocoding and research.

ResearchProjectDef.label: deep-space mining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize feedback circuits to incentivize AI persona cores to pilot asteroid mining pods which can navigate further and operate with more autonomy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: military robotics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Improve the durability and reliability of robotic control, allowing designs based on personas which can handle more complex tasks like hauling and weapon targeting.

ResearchProjectDef.label: psychic theory
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop a basic theoretical understanding of psychic processes, enough to produce psychic foil and construct psychic helmets therefrom.

ResearchProjectDef.label: universal simulation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to construct mechanisms for AI personas to construct believable universes, and develop psychic interfaces which can produce a completely immersive experience for users.
